Package co.cask.cdap.api.flow

Flow implementations.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Flow Flow is a collection of Flowlets that are wired together into a Direct Acylic Graph (DAG).
FlowSpecification This class provides the specification of a Flow.
FlowSpecification.Builder.ConnectFrom Defines the starting flowlet for a connection.
FlowSpecification.Builder.ConnectTo Class defining the ConnectTo interface for a connection.
FlowSpecification.Builder.FlowletAdder FlowletAdder is responsible for capturing the information of a Flowlet during the specification creation.
FlowSpecification.Builder.MoreConnect Interface that defines the building of FlowSpecification.
 

Class Summary
FlowletConnection Defines a connection between two Flowlets or from a Stream to a Flowlet.
FlowletDefinition Class defining the definition for a flowlet.
FlowSpecification.Builder Defines a builder for building connections or topology for a flow.
 

Enum Summary
FlowletConnection.Type Defines different types of sources a flowlet can be connected to.
 

Package co.cask.cdap.api.flow Description

Flow implementations.

Every flow must implement the Flow interface.
